pub.citation: Baldwin, B. G. Adaptive radiation of the Hawaiian Silversword alliance: congruence and conflict of phylogenetic evidence from molecular and non-molecular investigations. In Molecular Evolution and Adaptive Radiation. Eds. T. J. Givnish and K. J. Sytsma. Cambridge, 2000.

pmmd.notes: The semi-strict consensus of eight minimum-length trees from Fitch-parsimoney analysis of 18-26S nuclear ribosomal DNA (nrDNA) internal transcribed space (ITS) sequences in representatives of the Hawaiian silversword alliance.
